title: Gm Rapid Game Phase System
description: A game phase system that allows you to control every moment from the start menu to the end of the game.
longDescription:
The 'Gm Rapid Game Phase Manager' is a game phase system that allows you to control every moment from the start menu to the end of the game.


Gm Rapid Game Phase Manager is universally applicable across various project types, and once you become accustomed to using it, you can easily oversee all development stages and player execution processes at a glance.


It is the perfect solution to eliminate time-consuming inconveniences such as difficulty locating or spending too much time searching for where complex logics are intertwined.

Additionally, integrating this plugin into an existing project is remarkably straightforward, and it fully supports multiplayer environments, enhancing collaborative and interactive game development.


Opting for this tool will allow you to maintain your project in prime condition, working less while achieving more – truly the best choice for elevating your brilliant projects.


Additionally, the ultimate goal of this plugin is to become an essential,

innovative Game Phase Manager plugin that every new project should have.

We actively welcome and incorporate feedback and suggestions from all purchasers through our dedicated support Discord.


Documentation 1.0

Tutorial Video (1.0)


If you are already using the GmGAS plugin in your project, you must disable it.

This asset already includes the GmGAS plugin, so by activating this plugin, you can continue to use GmGAS as well.


Why Choose the 'Gm' Series?(This is important to buyers.)


🎮DISCORD INTEGRATED SUPPORT CHANNEL🎮


🎁Another list of assets from the developer


Please note that this code plugin is continuously evolving with regular refinements and feature additions. 

As features are enhanced and expanded, prices may increase slightly.

Your ongoing support is greatly appreciated as we strive to deliver an even more robust and feature-rich experience.

Your feedback, suggestions, and update requests are highly valued.

Feel free to reach out via Discord or e-mail for any questions or requests regarding the plugin.

Your satisfaction is our priority.
technicalDetails:
Features:

  •  Universal Applicability - Suitable for various types of projects.
  •  Comprehensive Phase Management - Oversee all development stages and player execution processes effortlessly.
  •  Time-Saving - Eliminates the hassle of locating and intertwining complex logics.
  • Easy Integration - Seamlessly integrates into existing projects.
  • Multiplayer Support - Fully supports multiplayer environments, enhancing collaborative game development.
  • Efficiency and Productivity - Maintain your project in prime condition, achieving more with less effort.


Code Modules:

  •  GmGameplayAbilitySystem [Runtime]
  •  GmRapidGamePhaseManager [Runtime]

Number of Blueprints: 5

Number of C++ Classes: 7

Network Replicated: Yes

Supported Development Platforms: Windows

Supported Target Build Platforms: Windows

(It has not been tested on platforms other than Windows, but is expected to work smoothly.)

Important/Additional Notes: Please enable Gameplay Ability in your project.
